metadata.title: 9th Grade - Week 4 - Reading
metadata.description: Practice test for 9th grade students, week 4, reading subject.
metadata.subject: reading

sections.name: Reading Comprehension
sections.subject: reading
sections.description: Reading Comprehension practice questions for 9th grade students.

questions.subject: reading
questions.questionText: What is the main idea of the passage? (Week 4, Question 1)
questions.passageText: This is a sample reading passage for 9th grade students. The passage discusses various topics relevant to students at this grade level. It contains information that students need to understand and analyze to answer the questions correctly.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is B because it best summarizes the main idea of the passage.
